https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kxFKOY3rMWWHdU02gvtVsABKMDa.jpg During the Roman Empire, General Crassius ruled a small province with an Iron fist. Serena, a young girl in a village, watches Crassius kill her parents. Crassius and Serena's destiny would lead them to the Gladiator ring; the Amazons Warrior vs the Roman General. Amazons and Gladiators
